data.title: The Shorties 2010-11: Arsenal Awards Voting
data.meta_description:
Your categories and nominees:
Player of the Season: Robin van Persie, Jack Wilshere
Goal of the Season: Arshavin vs. Barcelona, van Persie vs. Barcelona, Nasri vs. Fulham (2nd goal), Ramsey vs. Man...
data.text:
Your categories and nominees:

Player of the Season: Robin van Persie, Jack Wilshere

Goal of the Season: Arshavin vs. Barcelona, van Persie vs. Barcelona, Nasri vs. Fulham (2nd goal), Ramsey vs. Man United, Nasri vs. Fulham (1st goal), van Persie vs. Wolves

Breakout Player of the Season: Johan Djourou, Wojciech Szczesny, Jack Wilshere

Lesbian of the Season: Samir Nasri, Tomas Rosicky, Andrei Arshavin, Pat Rice, Marouane Chamakh

Game of the Season: 2-1 vs. Barcelona, 3-1 vs. Chelsea, 1-0 vs. Man United (all home games, interestingly)

Goalkeeping Error of the Season: Carling Cup Final, Almunia vs. West Brom (home), Almunia vs. West Brom (away), Not signing Schwarzer

Player You Most Want Sold: Sebastian Squillaci, Tomas Rosicky, Nicklas Bendtner, Denilson, Squilmuniason

Dumbest Moment of the Season: Carling Cup Final, Diaby's red at Newcastle, 4-4 draw at Newcastle, Eboue, Cesc's backheel vs. Barca, Cesc's handball vs. Spurs

Moment When You Started to Believe: 6-0 vs. Braga, 3-1 vs. Chelsea, 3-0 vs. Man City, 2-1 vs. Barcelona

Moment When You Realized It Was All Over: 1-1 vs. Liverpool, 0-0 vs. Blackburn, 0-2 vs. Man United, 2-2 vs. West Brom

Unluckiest Player of the Season: Theo. No other nominees allowed.

Polls close Sunday, June 19th at 11:59 PM EDT. Because I really will be checking then. Yeah. She was nice (if you don't get the reference, what rock have you been living under?)
